text: Cornell Dining's Unlimited plan is required for first-year undergraduates.

text: Cornell’s estimated cost of attendance (COA) is used to determine need-based aid eligibility.
label: true

text: The COA depends on college, residency, academic program, and housing plans.

text: The Student Health Plan (SHP) cost is included in the COA used for financial aid.

text: Cornell waives tuition for all NY State residents regardless of college.
